reasoning: Reporting birth incidence of cystic fibrosis. Global incidence approximately 1.5 per 100k live births (varies by ethnicity: 3-4 per 100k in Caucasians, <1 per 100k in Asian populations). Based on newborn screening data and patient registries.
source: Farrell PM et al. (2008). The prevalence of cystic fibrosis in the European Union. J Cyst Fibros. 7(5):450-453
